sentences.en: A brisk north-west wind swept across the region.
sentences.cn: 寒冷干燥的西北风横扫了这个地区。

sentences.en: a typically brisk winter's day on the south coast
sentences.cn: 南海岸典型的寒冷而清新的冬日

sentences.en: As they started up again, the horse broke into a brisk trot.
sentences.cn: 当他们又重新骑上马时，马突然轻快地小跑起来。

sentences.en: Brisk walking burns up more calories than slow jogging.
sentences.cn: 快走比慢跑能消耗更多的热量。

sentences.en: He felt strangely exhilarated by the brisk, blue morning.
sentences.cn: 那个凉爽而晴朗的早晨让他异常兴奋。

sentences.en: He moved at a brisk pace down the rue St Antoine.
sentences.cn: 他沿着圣安托万街轻快地走去。

sentences.en: Her voice was well pitched and brisk.
Matron was quite kind but brisk and hurried.
sentences.cn: 女舍监人很善良，但做事干脆利落、风风火火。

sentences.en: She began to read in a brisk, unemotional voice.
sentences.cn: 她念了起来，语调利落而平静。

sentences.en: She went for a brisk walk to work off her frustration.
sentences.cn: 她快步走了一会儿，以排解心中的沮丧。

sentences.en: Taking a brisk walk can often induce a feeling of well-being.
sentences.cn: 快步行走常常会使人感到身心舒畅。

sentences.en: The breeze was cool, brisk and invigorating.
sentences.cn: 微风凉爽、清新，令人精神振奋。

sentences.en: The Chief summoned me downstairs. He was brisk and businesslike.
sentences.cn: 主管叫我到楼下。他做事干练、务实。

sentences.en: They moved out from the airport at a brisk clip.
They set off at a brisk pace .
sentences.cn: 他们踏着轻快的步伐上路了。

sentences.en: They set off at a brisk pace.
sentences.cn: 他们踏着轻快的步伐上路了。

sentences.en: to set off at a brisk pace
Vendors were doing a brisk trade in souvenirs.
sentences.cn: 商贩们的纪念品生意很红火。

trans.tran_cn: 轻快的，（生意）兴隆的，（天气）凉爽的，精干利落的
